name: channel_playlists
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube.
Tool description: With the YouTube Data API, you can add various YouTube features to your app. Use the API for search, videos, playlists, channels and more.
API description: Fetches playlists from a specified YouTube channel using the YouTube Data API and various filters.

filter.description:
Filter key or token, default: `all_collections`

Keys you can enter:

- `all_collections`: Returns playlist collections
- `created_playlists_newest`: Returns created playlists (by newest)
- `created_playlists_last_video_added`: Returns created playlists (by last video added)
- `saved_playlists`: Returns saved playlists
- or custom collection token

is_id.description: The YouTube channel ID to fetch playlists for. Defaults to 'UC-lHJZR3Gqxm24_Vd_AJ5Yw'.

gl.description: Geolocation parameter to filter results by region. Defaults to 'US'.

hl.description: Language parameter, specified as a BCP-47 language code. Defaults to 'en'.

cursor.description: Continuation token for pagination. Defaults to None.
